summary: The implementation successfully covers all 7 requirements. The Performance Gallery component has been created with scroll animations, hover effects, modal lightbox with navigation, proper styling, lazy loading, and is integrated into Case Study 1 without modifying existing text content. All requested features are present in the diff.

hallucinated_features.description: Keyboard navigation support for lightbox (Arrow keys and Escape key)
hallucinated_features.reason: The ImageLightbox component includes keyboard event listeners for ArrowLeft, ArrowRight, and Escape keys, which were not explicitly requested in the BuildRequest requirements

hallucinated_features.description: Image counter display in lightbox showing current position (e.g., '1 / 2')
hallucinated_features.reason: The lightbox includes a counter showing 'currentIndex + 1 / images.length' at the bottom of the modal, which was not specified in the requirements

hallucinated_features.description: Close button (X icon) in top-right corner of lightbox
hallucinated_features.reason: While REQ-4 mentions clicking outside closes the modal, the implementation adds an explicit X button using lucide-react icons that was not requested

hallucinated_features.description: Hover overlay with 'Click to enlarge' text on gallery images
hallucinated_features.reason: The gallery images include a hover overlay with instructional text that appears on hover, which was not specified in the requirements

hallucinated_features.description: Body scroll lock when lightbox is open
hallucinated_features.reason: The implementation sets 'document.body.style.overflow = hidden' when lightbox opens, preventing background scrolling - not explicitly requested
